Articles.Content: Hello I currently have a functional shuttle which I have built using Aeronology - Space Shuttle Pack and for external tanks I use the reDIRECT mod, but I am looking for a mod that allows me to build a more realistic looking shuttle. I have tried the Shuttle Orbiter Construction Kit mod but I have had problems, the loading bay does not appear and the wings appear superimposed one on the other, would there be a solution to this problem or could they recommend a mod that is compatible with the ksp version 1.3.1
Why do you use a very old version of KSP with newer Mods?
